actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the act entitled "An Act to incorporate the National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution."

summary.text: Removes the limitation on the amount of property which may be lawfully held or acquired by the National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution. Grants sole and exclusive right to the Society for the use of its name and such emblems, seals, and badges as it has adopted.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the act entitled "An Act to incorporate the National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution."
